column6: BIG THUNDER...OFF THE RAILS! - The spirit of Big Thunder Mountain takes our heroes on their wildest ride yet! - But will they all survive it unscathed? - Mysterious mountain spirits, runaway mine trains, and a fortune in gold at stake-it's all been leading to this!
column8: | writer:Dennis Hopeless | penciller (cover):Marcio Takara | artist:Tigh Walker
